Summary: Co-Founder & CTO with 6+ years of experience spanning full-stack development, product management, and technology leadership. Currently leading QuantumKnowledge as CTO, building a secure SaaS document management platform with access control, compliance, and audit automation. Strong technical foundation in JavaScript/Node.js/React, enhanced by product vision, system architecture, and team leadership. Combines hands-on development with strategic technology direction, proven through founding role and parallel product management position at Scent Emotions.

CleanedResumeText:
DONALDO ORUCI | donaldoruci@gmail.com | Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain

TITLE
Co-Founder & CTO | Full-Stack Developer | Product Leader

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Co-Founder & CTO — QuantumKnowledge | Hybrid, Barcelona, Spain | Sep 2025 – Present
• Lead the technology vision and product development of a secure, compliance-driven document management platform built for organizations handling sensitive information.
• Building the Knowledge Data Lake, a next-generation SaaS solution integrating access control, NDA validation, and digital evidence-based traceability.
• Design and oversee architecture, infrastructure, and product roadmap from backend systems and database security to user experience and audit automation.
• Skills: SaaS Architecture, System Design, Security & Compliance, Product Strategy, Team Leadership

Software Engineer & Product Manager — Scent Emotions | Part-time, Hybrid, Barcelona, Spain | Jul 2025 – Present
• Contribute to digital development and online presence for Scent Emotions.
• Support early product concepts connecting creative scent-based experiences with emerging digital solutions.
• Skills: Front-End Development, Tailwind CSS, Product Management, UX Design

Digital Content & Ad Specialist — ROI ADS | Full-time, Remote, USA | Aug 2023 – Sep 2024
• Created high-performing visual assets for online advertising in search arbitrage.
• Optimized media for web performance and collaborated with IT teams to streamline design-to-code workflows.
• Skills: Performance Improvement, Digital Marketing, Visual Design

Web Developer — autotrego.com | Remote | Jul 2024 – Sep 2024
• Built and maintained autotrego.com end-to-end, from backend setup to responsive front-end implementation.
• Focused on performance and usability, ensuring a clean, efficient web application.

Web Developer Junior (Full-Stack) — Freelancer | Jun 2021 – Nov 2022
• Worked alongside a senior developer on multiple projects, contributing to front-end and back-end tasks.
• Practiced coding standards, debugging, and optimization for web applications.

Team Leader — AIESEC Albania | Oct 2021 – Nov 2022
• Led a diverse team to plan and deliver leadership/cross-cultural projects; delegated tasks and ensured delivery.

Assistant Teacher — ICT Academy | Sep 2020 – Mar 2021
• Taught entry-level programming: Unity, Game Development, C#, C++, MIT App Inventor, and Web (HTML/CSS/JS, Node.js, SQL).

Intern, Web App (Back-End) — IMB SHPK | Jul 2020 – Sep 2020
• Built dynamic web solutions using Node.js, Firebase, and RESTful APIs.

Web Developer Intern (Full-Stack) — Almotech.co | Jul 2019 – Dec 2019
• Developed responsive websites/web apps using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React; exposure to back-end tasks.

ACHIEVEMENTS & ACTIVITIES
• NASA International Space Apps Challenge 2022 — Participated in global hackathon.
• AIESEC Workshop 2019 — Emotional Intelligence training.
• Full Academic/Talent Scholarship (POLIS University) — 3 consecutive years.
• OSCAL 2018–2019 — Delegate at Open Source Conference Albania.
• Film & Media — Scenic design roles (incl. collaboration with cinematographer Jorg Widmer) and props support.
• Music — Band leader and performer (self-taught guitar/bass), live shows and recorded demos.

SKILLS
Programming: JavaScript, Node.js, PHP, C#, C++, Java, SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
Front-End: HTML, CSS, React, Bootstrap, Ant Design, Ionic, WordPress
Back-End & APIs: Node.js/Express.js, RESTful APIs, Firebase
Tools: Git, GitHub, Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Cisco Packet Tracer, Slack, Canva
Practices: Agile, Design-to-Code Workflows, SEO, Market Research, Search Arbitrage

LANGUAGES
• Albanian: Native
• English: Advanced (C1)
• Italian: Advanced
• Turkish: Basic

EDUCATION
B.Sc. in Computer Science — POLIS University, Tirana, Albania | 2021 – 2024 (180 ECTS)
Vocational High School for ICT — Hermann Gmeiner, Tirana, Albania | 2017 – 2021
